column29: Due to heavy rainfall and cloudburst, right lateral Moraine dammed lake: collapsed barrier's proximal location to the snout of the glacier; lake was completely drained within 5-10 mins; 138 houses destroyed, 56 were partly damaged. 3 towns: Gaurikund, Rambara and Kedarnath were completely washed away. Roads and footpath between Gaurikund and Kedarnath damaged
